column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Police in Preah Sihanouk province said that on March 14
column6: there was a work accident which killed a Chinese man.------The victim was working under a transport container
column7: when a cable somehow broke or the winch malfunctioned
column8: dropping the heavy box onto him.------It took nearly two hours to remove the container
column9: and the man was already dead.------The business involved is reported as Wondua
